column4: does anyone know if there are issues with installing wine?  I get the traditional: 'package referred by others but not found' error.
apt-get install wine fails
try SUDO apt-get install wine
did you add thee repositobe?
did you add the repository
i'm not sure to be truthful.... http://www.winehq.org  click on Download(or get now, something like that). click Ubuntu, it shows you how to add the repo and download wine
Thanks,  I'm just surprised they don't have their own packages.
they do...
its in one of the ubuntu repos, i'm just not sure which one to be truthful.
there's a gozillion.. :)
quite a few.
haven't heard of that one.
some are official, some are unofficial "backports", etc...
wow, even Google doesn't know about gozillion
gozillion is a really high number....lol
oooh,...i thought that was the name :)
lol.. no.. it was a reference to how many repos are out there for Ubuntu.
i realize there are a lot of unnoficial ones.  I just would have thought that Ubuntu would have their own wine package in one of the top three.
again, i thought it was to be truthful, but who knows.
but its real easy to install from the wine repo.
yeah i'm looking at it now.
ok..
sling media?
oh ok.
